breakfast.title: Omleta cu legume
breakfast.description: 3 albusuri, 1 galbenus, legume ( ardei gras, masiline ), 2 felii de paine integrala prajita

breakfast.title: Tartine cu unt de arahide
breakfast.description: 2 felii de paine integrala prajita ( la toaster ), unsa cu 20 g unt de arahide, 20 g miere si o banana taiata felii si pusa deasupra

breakfast.title: Creveti cu cartofi dulci piure
breakfast.description: 150 g creveti la gratar plus 250 g cartofi dulci fierti si facuti piure

lunch.title: Piept de pui cu sparanghel si paste
lunch.description: 35 g paste integrale, 150 g piept de pui la gratar, 100 g sparanghel la gratar

lunch.title: File de cod cu broccoli
lunch.description: 150 g file cod la gratar plus 200 g broccoli fiert

lunch.title: Pulpa de pui cu fasole verde
lunch.description: 150g pulpa de pui (FARA piele) la gratar plus 150 g fasole verde fiarta

dinner.title: Supa crema de legume
dinner.description: 50 g dovelcel, 50 g broccoli, 50 g morcov, 50 g linte (se fierb toate si se fac la blender )

dinner.title: Ficatei cu cartofi natur
dinner.description: 150 g ficatei de pui la gratar, 200 grame cartofi natur  si musdei ( dupa gust )

dinner.title: File somon cu orez negru
dinner.description: 150 g file somon plus 35 g orez negru fiert, condimente dupa gust
